answerText: A Cool Million; or, the Dismantling of Lemuel Pitkin[10] The title character of this novel is shot by the husband of a woman who had written to his advice column in revenge for his seduction and later beating of her.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | Finals 1 | 8 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel's protagonist loves Betty Prail, who is raped several times in this novel. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Lem Pitkin travels to New York to seek his fortune at Shagpoke Whipple's advice and dies after a series of misfortunes.
